title: Uk: broadsheet ve tabloid / phil baines / dave wadmore
content:
uk based designers are invited to this event:   
"Broadsheet v Tabloid   
An open forum on aspects of type design"   
featuring Phil Baines and Dave Wadmore   
   
It's this friday   
   
 [http://www.fedrigonievents.co.uk/event\_fonts03.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080407194321/http:/www.fedrigonievents.co.uk/event_fonts03.html)

 [‹ How to calculate the best font metrics?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080407194321/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2000 "Go to previous forum topic") [Newspaper print effect ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080407194321/http:/www.typophile.com/node/1997 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jades
